mapper.insert: insert into customer(id, customer_no, customer_name, contact_person, tel, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id}, #{customerNo}, #{customerName}, #{contactPerson}, #{tel}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: select c.id, c.customer_no, c.customer_name, c.contact_person, c.tel, c.gmt_create from customer c order by id
